rows.label: tev021301_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021301_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask about Dana's duties as a BLADE.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021301_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021301_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Dana about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021301_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Dana about the enemy attack.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021301_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Dana what she intends to do next.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021301_MSG0001
rows.name:
When I was on outer-wall guard duty, I heard what
sounded like a grex's roar coming from near the
west gate.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021301_MSG0002
rows.name:
I ran down to intervene, but the noob that Colonel
Elma found had already taken it out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021301_MSG0003
rows.name:
I'm curious to get a look at [ST:gender p1=him p2=her ]. I want to see what
kind of new recruit is able to pull off Interceptor
defense work on their first day on the job![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021301_MSG0004
rows.name:
Well, you're looking at [ST:gender p1=him p2=her ], Dana.
This is [ST:playername ], the new recruit. [ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021301_MSG0005
rows.name:
Oh no, Irina! I am so sorry!
I didn't know the noob was on your team![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021301_MSG0006
rows.name:
The "noob" is leading this team.
I'm just a member.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021301_MSG0007
rows.name:
Holy wow. [ST:gender p1=He p2=She ] must be some kind of super-noob if
you're working for [ST:gender p1=him p2=her ] now![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021301_MSG0008
rows.name:
I serve in the Interceptors division, and I wake up
every day excited to go to work.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021301_MSG0009
rows.name:
Though I still haven't quite mastered the art of piloting
a Skell, so I'm not very good at killing tough monsters.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021301_MSG0010
rows.name: But what I lack in skill, I make up for in enthusiasm![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021301_MSG0011
rows.name:
I just wished Christopher would notice that and come
talk to me...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021301_MSG0012
rows.name:
Argh! I did not just say that out loud! Forget I said
anything! I'm not out here to meet boys, all right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021301_MSG0023
rows.name:
Their attack was brutal. We lost a ton of good
Interceptors that day.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021301_MSG0024
rows.name:
And that includes an old friend of mine who jumped
in front of a missile in order to protect New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021301_MSG0025
rows.name:
What a brave, heroic...fool he was. Goddammit.
We have to find the Lifehold Core and bring him
back as soon as humanly possible![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021301_MSG0026
rows.name:
And then, once we're all drinking the night away,
I'm gonna ask him what it felt like to die like that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021301_MSG0027
rows.name:
They found the Lifehold Core, right? So when are we
gonna get our real bodies back?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021301_MSG0028
rows.name:
I have to bring all of our dead friends back.
Then we're gonna gang up on Irina and make her go
drinking with us![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021301_MSG0029
rows.name:
I bet beer tastes even better when it's flowing through
a flesh-and-blood body.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021301_MSG0030
rows.name: Marcus gave his life for us...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021301_MSG0031
rows.name:
Irina! Don't say things like that!
What happened to that stiff upper lip of yours?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021301_MSG0032
rows.name:
We're gonna find the Lifehold Core and bring him
back. And then I'm gonna punch him right in the face
for making you sad![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021301_MSG0033
rows.name:
Thanks, Dana. Your boundless enthusiasm always
makes me feel better.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021301_MSG0034
rows.name: I'm sure it won't be long.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021301_MSG0035
rows.name:
That's great! When everyone comes back,
we're gonna make you come drink with us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021301_MSG0036
rows.name:
I see you're as enthusiastic about your drinking as you
are about your missions...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021301_MSG0037
rows.name: Of course! Enthusiasm's pretty much all I've got![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021301_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask Dana about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021301_MSG0039
rows.name: Christopher is so good to me. I couldn't be happier![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021301_MSG0042
rows.name:
And you're the cupid who brought us together!
I owe such a debt of gratitude to both you and that
weird Ma-non, Chiopitus.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021301_MSG0043
rows.name:
Still, I'm not just going to lie back and rely on
Christopher for everything.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021301_MSG0044
rows.name:
I'm going to redouble my efforts as an Interceptor
in order to protect our future together![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021301_SEL0061
rows.name: Ask Dana about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021301_MSG0080
rows.name: I never want to talk to you about Christopher again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021301_MSG0081
rows.name:
You and that Ma-non, Chiopitus or whatever,
you're like anti-cupids. Love withers and dies
whenever you're near.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021301_MSG0082
rows.name:
We can talk about missions and stuff if you want,
but I don't ever want to hear you speak the name
"Christopher" again![ST:wait ]
